comment: Like a knot coming undone, it begins to unravel from the point of contact.
Upon hearing the beast's roar, victory shall be in your grasp.
The sound of one's fellows, beating down in the bowels of the earth. This tune calls forth the dead.
Temptation takes one by the hand. Darkness is its ultimate destination.
O light of the heavens, rain down upon me as I am anointed with your blessing.
Give thanks to the gentle rain. Be grateful for the water's soothing touch.
A bountiful harvest leads to blessings. Dazzling, glittering...as you wish.
To begin, stand resolute. Take aim and bring it down.
Come, gather around. Brilliance is at your fingertips.
The shackles have fallen away, along with all peace of mind.
"Fou! Foufoufooou!!!" (Translation: Put me on a Command Card of your choice!)
"So this is the new Servant support spell...a Command Code. It's wonderful, Senpai! Putting it on a Command Card will enable a variety of effects!"
Its name means the sword that grants victory. It's said that the light it emits contains the people's wishes.
Chaldea, The Security Organization for the Preservation of Humanity. We safeguard the future of mankind. Our wish is for the path we take to be the right one.

The magical seal mark of a certain Master.
It has the image of a gem that is filled with magical energy.
A chain that was said to have once bound the Bull of Heaven. They say that the greater the target's Divinity, the more constrictive the chain becomes.

"Engravings are a symbol of power. It is only sensible to choose me as a symbol.
Make use of this power as you like!"

A certain Master's Command Seal.
It bears the image of a small chalice.

A longsword of twilight infused with magical energy from the Age of Gods.
It can turn into a sacred sword or a demonic sword, depending on its wielder.
"Master, I will entrust my back to you. In return, should you ever come against an obstacle, I will open the path for you with this blade."

"The legendary hunter of myth, and just an overall good-looking guy who's a big hit with the ladies.

Yep, that's me. Orion the superman.
Other than the fact that I accidentally pierced the heart of a goddess, I'm the perfect love hunter...heh heh.

So don't hesitate to pair me with any of the cute Servant girls!

Oh, but that aside, don't waste your time looking up the meaning of my name, okay?"
A certain Master's magical seal. It bears an image of the martial arts power that dwells within the Master's body.
The sword mentioned in the story of the one who established the foundation of modern alchemy. Parents and masters often offer it as a celebration of reaching adulthood.

I will neither compromise nor make exceptions regarding the three rules for what makes good children. Not even at Christmas.

First, they must remain dignified when meeting Santa.
Second, they must reward Santa with their smiles.
Third, they must send Santa off with gratitude.

And one final thing: they must await next Christmas with hope.

Reindeer and I shall only visit those who can follow those rules. Our gifts may be random, but we will tolerate no complaints.

A giant demonic beast let loose into the wild thanks to the disrespect shown by a certain king.
Its appearance is the embodiment of divine punishment from the moon goddess.

A truly divine treasure among treasures of the underworld, powerful enough to revive the dead.
Due to its owner, its performance is limited to only a fraction of its full potential.

"You've done a terrific job today☆
Would you like a meal first? Or would you like a bath first?
Or perhaps you would like an e-v-e-n-t♡
As your reliable fox shrine maiden, I will support you however I can, Master!"

The magical seal mark of a certain Master.
It bears the image of a flower that represents spring.

A dark-coated dove that lives in the floating gardens. They work as messengers reporting about various occurrences during the season of love. Though they are familiars, they sometimes reveal the secrets of their own master. Coo-coo-poh.

The sword of darkness said to slice through even five-star rated ☆s. Whether this is true or not is unclear, but through the guidance of Alternium, the sword became the ultimate final weapon for the Dark R.O.U.N.D.S. that possesses incredible power.

Also, it can be purchased online, but rumors of this sword being a favorite of a cute, mysterious literature aficionado knight circulated, causing the sword to sell for a premium.

"If you are to take a supreme sword like myself as your bride, then the sheath must also be superb as well. Though, some may differ in interpreting what 'superb' means here, since there are a great many things one might be proud of! Master, do not hold back. Tell me your dreams. I exist to be wielded to grant those dreams. Heh. My love is more fiery than a dragon's breath. Prepare yourself...and make use of me!"
